name: AGPC
description: AGPC is a blockchain-based service to provide accelerating, funding, game publishing, and investing campaigns to the various games. Throughout the user's information in the campaign, the AGPC platform transparently discloses information on which customers have purchased which products and how much profits are made by paying AGPC TOKEN for the campaign. The funds made by the participants will be rewarded to according to the reasonable contract code. AGPC aims to promote and share rights and interests that enable everyone in the service to realize common values and to get away from unclear and unreliable funds and companies.
